name: NoStupidButtons
description: This mod hides the buttons nobody uses!

menulayer-title.name: MenuLayer
menulayer-title.description: Everything that can be adjusted in MenuLayer

hide-newgrounds-button.name: Hide Newgrounds Button
hide-newgrounds-button.description: Toggles if the Newgrounds Button should be hidden in the Main Menu

hide-more-games-button.name: Hide More Games Button
hide-more-games-button.description: Toggles if the More Games button should be hidden in the Main Menu. Will not work if DevTools is insalled on Android

hide-social-media-buttons.name: Hide Social Media Buttons
hide-social-media-buttons.description: Toggles if the Social Media buttons should be hidden in the Main Menu

reposition-robtop-logo.name: Reposition RobTop Logo
reposition-robtop-logo.description: Repositions the RobTop logo in a way that I (the mod developer) find nicer to look at when hiding the social media buttons.

reposition-profile-btn.name: Reposition profile Button
reposition-profile-btn.description: Repositions the profile button to be next to the bottom menu

hide-robtop-logo.name: Hide RobTop Logo
hide-robtop-logo.description: Toggles if the RobTop logo should be hidden in the Main Menu

creatorlayer-title.name: CreatorLayer
creatorlayer-title.description: Everything that can be adjusted in CreatorLayer

hide-map-button.name: Hide Map Button
hide-map-button.description: Toggles if the Map button should be removed from CreatorLayer

hide-versus-button.name: Hide Versus Button
hide-versus-button.description: Toggles if the Versus button should be removed from CreatorLayer
